content: अनुवद् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To imitate in speaking, mock (with <ab>acc.</ab>); गिरं नः… अनुवदति शुकस्ते मंजुवाक् पंजरस्थः <ls>R. 5. 74</ls> repeat; उक्तमनुवदति <ls>Sk.</ls>; (P. & A.) to resound, echo; अनुवदति वीणा <ls>P. I. 3. 49</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> अनुवदते कठः कलापस्य {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; सभाभित्तिप्रतिध्वानैर्भयादन्ववदन्निव <ls>Śi. 2. 67</ls> echoed and approved also; घोषस्यान्ववदिष्टेव लंका पूतक्रतोः पुरः <ls>Bk. 8. 29.</ls> {@--2@} To repeat or say again by way of explanation, illustration or corroboration; See <ls>Kull.</ls> on <ls>Ms. 1. 74</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">2. 6.</ls> {@--3@} To repeat, tell, say (generally); निजमनोरथमनुवदंत्या <ls>Dk. 21.</ls> {@--4@} To abuse, rail at. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to resound or echo.
